item.desc: 当前用户控制的区域树s
item.sql:
SELECT abd_area_id id, abd_parent_id pid, abd_area_name name, 'area.png' icon, 1 type, null status FROM com_area_base_dtls INNER JOIN
(SELECT DISTINCT (oar_area_id) FROM (SELECT odd_id FROM sys_org_dept_dtls START WITH odd_id = :cus CONNECT BY PRIOR odd_id = odd_parent_id) INNER JOIN com_org_area_rltn ON odd_id = oar_dept_id) ON abd_area_id = oar_area_id UNION ALL SELECT odd_id id, odd_parent_id pid, odd_name name, 'org.png' icon, 0 type, null status FROM sys_org_dept_dtls WHERE LEVEL < :level START WITH odd_id =:cus CONNECT BY PRIOR odd_id = odd_parent_id

SELECT abd_area_id id, abd_parent_id pid, abd_area_name name, 'area.png' icon, 1 type, NULL status, abd_cus_number cus FROM com_area_base_dtls INNER JOIN
(SELECT DISTINCT (oar_area_id) FROM (SELECT odd_id FROM sys_org_dept_dtls START WITH odd_id = :cus CONNECT BY PRIOR odd_id = odd_parent_id) INNER JOIN com_org_area_rltn ON odd_id = oar_dept_id) ON abd_area_id = oar_area_id

WITH t AS (SELECT odd_id, odd_name, odd_parent_id,odd_data_auth auth FROM sys_org_dept_dtls START WITH odd_id = :cus CONNECT BY PRIOR odd_id = odd_parent_id)
SELECT DISTINCT '1-' || (odd_id) id, odd_name name, '1-' ||odd_parent_id pid, 'org.png' icon, auth, 0 type FROM t START WITH odd_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT (ubd_dept_id) FROM sys_user_base_dtls) CONNECT BY odd_id =PRIOR odd_parent_id UNION ALL SELECT id, name, pid, icon, -1, 1 type FROM (SELECT '' || ubd_id id, ubd_name name, '1-' || ubd_dept_id pid, 'user.png' icon FROM sys_user_base_dtls z INNER JOIN t ON odd_id = ubd_dept_id WHERE ubd_id!=:user AND ubd_admin!=1 )

where.desc: 根据区域好查询出所有下级区域

item.where: ( SELECT abd_area_id id, abd_cus_number cus FROM com_area_base_dtls WHERE abd_cus_number=:cus START WITH abd_area_id = :area CONNECT BY PRIOR abd_area_id = abd_parent_id )t

order.desc: 门禁类别值为2 系统管理员

order.desc: 广播类别值为4 系统管理员

item.desc: 根据用户id，区域id查询出用户有权限查看的数据
item.sql:
SELECT WM_CONCAT( id ) id FROM
( SELECT abd_area_id area FROM com_area_base_dtls WHERE abd_cus_number=:cus START WITH abd_area_id = :area CONNECT BY PRIOR abd_area_id = abd_parent_id ) INNER JOIN
( SELECT DISTINCT(oar_area_id) area FROM ( SELECT odd_id FROM sys_org_dept_dtls START WITH odd_id = :cus CONNECT BY PRIOR odd_id = odd_parent_id ) INNER JOIN com_org_area_rltn ON odd_id = oar_dept_id ) INNER JOIN
( SELECT t.dbd_id id, dbd_area_id FROM dor_door_base_dtls t INNER JOIN com_dvc_auth_set ON dbd_id=das_dvc_id WHERE das_user_id=:user AND das_dvc_type=2 ) ON dbd_area_id=area
( SELECT t.CBD_ID id, cbd_area_id FROM cmr_camera_base_dtls t INNER JOIN com_dvc_auth_set ON cbd_id=das_dvc_id WHERE das_user_id=:user AND das_dvc_type=1 ) ON cbd_area_id = area
( SELECT t.TBD_ID id, tbd_area_id FROM tbk_talkback_base_dtls t INNER JOIN com_dvc_auth_set ON tbd_id=das_dvc_id WHERE das_user_id=:user AND das_dvc_type=3 ) ON tbd_area_id = area
( SELECT t.BBD_ID id, bbd_area_id FROM bct_broadcast_base_dtls t INNER JOIN com_dvc_auth_set ON bbd_id=das_dvc_id WHERE das_user_id=:user AND das_dvc_type=4 ) ON bbd_area_id = area
( SELECT t.NBD_ID id, nbd_area_id FROM alt_network_base_dtls t INNER JOIN com_dvc_auth_set ON nbd_id=das_dvc_id WHERE das_user_id=:user AND das_dvc_type=6 ) ON nbd_area_id = area

item.desc: 删除用户管理的权限数据
item.sql: DELETE FROM com_dvc_auth_set WHERE das_user_id=:user AND das_cus_number=:cus AND das_dvc_type=:type
INSERT INTO com_dvc_auth_set ( das_cus_number, das_user_id, das_dvc_type, das_dvc_id, das_crte_time, das_crte_user_id ) VALUES ( :cus, :user, :type, :id, sysdate, :current )
